item.title: Vitiligo Tied to Alopecia, RA, Other Autoimmune Diseases
item.description: Adults with vitiligo show a higher prevalence of thyroid disease, alopecia areata, rheumatoid arthritis, and type 1 diabetes, a meta-analysis shows. M...

item.title: Back-to-School Asthma Hits Kids Harder in Low-Income Areas
item.description: Factors like housing and socioeconomic status affect health outcomes for asthmatic children. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Can CRISPR Help NK Cells Fight Cancer?
item.description: A new study suggests that novel CRISPR gene editing boosts natural killer cell function in cancer treatment. Medscape Medical News
